author: Staff Reporter
text:
A biker was mowed down by a speeding BMTC bus in Kamakshipalya on Sunday. The deceased has been identified as Ramakrishna (32). He was employed as a guard. The accident occurred at 4.50 p.m. when he was on his way to a relative's house. Though Ramakrishna was rushed to ESI hospital, he succumbed to his injuries. Kamakshipalya traffic police have arrested the BMTC bus driver, Rafeeque.

Hangs to death

A 22-year-old woman, working as a domestic help in the city, hanged herself to death at her house in Jeevanahalli on Sunday night. The victim has been identified as Varalakshmi. The incident came to light on Monday morning when Varalakshmi’s elder sister found her hanging from the ceiling in the kitchen. Varalakshmi was staying with her two elder sisters and was sleeping in the kitchen.
title: Biker mowed down by bus
